title: How does technology advance the world and solve challenges? - Quora

response.answer_text: By Optus BusinessEducationClimate changePovertyPublic safetyHealthcareDisaster reliefFarmingHow technology leaders can help????While solving societal issues is neither a quick nor simple process, technology does provide a range of new ways to tackle some of the most pressing issues the world faces. Those who work and lead in technology have the opportunity to be a part of the solution to today’s most social issues. The ability to identify where your organisation can make a difference, and collaborate with grassroots organisations, startups, local community groups and government agencies can help to address and improve many of these challenges. Enterprise has a responsibility to drive positive social action, and with all the possibilities presented by new technology, real and lasting change is very much within reach. When a business demonstrates a genuine purpose, consumers feel a connection to the brand and its products. They’ll choose the authentically purposeful company’s product, even though it means paying more. It’s an opportunity to move the needle on social challenges while creating economic value.

What do you mean by “ technology “ ? To me the term stands for the steps/ processes/ equipment used to employ some scientific principle to transform materials and data. Thus new technologies are developed to overcome some problem or shortage- and so are prima facie directed to solving issues facing humanity
